title: [Feature Request]: Add known issues page
body:
### Summary

It was discussed during one of the triage sessions- msbuild has a set of existing issues that are duplicated in the backlog regularly.
I suggest adding a page with "Known issues" that describes workarounds.
We can get inspiration from this dotnet repo: https://github.com/dotnet/core/blob/main/release-notes/8.0/known-issues.md 

### Background and Motivation

Duplicated tickets in backlog.

nodes.body: related user story (was under bar for 8.0 though): https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/8447
